column3: This particular test failure is because `SCRIPT_VERIFY_DISCOURAGE_UPGRADABLE_NOPS` should only be applied for NOPs that _aren't_ upgraded: See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21702#discussion_r701806626.\n\nIf the test passes when adding another script verification flag, it probably means that it was unnecessary to exclude this flag, the test should be updated to be more specific, or thi

After patch https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22871 then CSV will also have a DISCOURAGE_UPGRADABLE_NOP path.\n\nDISCOURAGE_UPGRADABLE can only ever be a soft fork since it's a non-consensus flag.
